title: How can i check my winrate with a champ?

replies.body:
http://1lann.github.io/lolreader/

Use this, you can check your combined normals and ranked stats, then you just subtract your ranked stats (these are saved on op.gg) and there you go.

You can check your winrate for a specific champ in ranked modes only, at the moment. If you go to your *Summoner Profile* and Click *Leagues* at the top, you can then hit *See more stats* in the bottom right and choose a champ to see your winrate with them.

Let me know if you have any questions.
